title: I was playing League today at a gameshop.
body:
LAN place I think, I had an hour to kill so I decided to play League, of course some 12 year old came in and was impressed by my skills. I was like "What rank are you?" and he said bronze, I promptly called him trash and that he was a waste of space, he began to cry but I saw right through his shit, I told him if he spent more time getting better at the game he wouldn't be bronze trash, he ran out and I never saw him again, good riddance tbh.

The other high ranked players congratulated me for my words and we proceeded to win that match, today was a good day.

replies.body: ROFL, get destroyed nerd kid, keep up the good work friend.

While it really does take some real balls to call a stranger "trash" or "waste of space" irl face to face, but attacking kids with that is really just stupid and frankly, extremely unpleasant.

If this story is to be believed that is.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Uaq3Xzh5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-20T00:58:08.676+0000)
>
> While it really does take some real balls to call a stranger "trash" or "waste of space" irl face to face, but attacking kids with that is really just stupid and frankly, extremely unpleasant.
> 
> If this story is to be believed that is.

just that thuglife.
